bug.author: tarockey
bug.summary: Remarks for run.upload_file uses incorrect parameter
bug.description:
In the example for run.upload_file, the example uses the parameter 'path', which does not exist. the correct parameter is 'path_or_stream' <denchmark-link:https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/python/api/azureml-core/azureml.core.run%28class%29?view=azure-ml-py#upload-file-name--path-or-stream->https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/python/api/azureml-core/azureml.core.run%28class%29?view=azure-ml-py#upload-file-name--path-or-stream-</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h4>Document Details</denchmark-h>
⚠ Do not edit this section. It is required for docs.microsoft.com ➟ GitHub issue linking.
ID: 9a70336d-fb4a-4c18-26d0-68784b5b3d72 Version Independent ID: e28876d8-08a0-8546-4bd1-6e434c8c7826 Content: azureml.core.Run class - Azure Machine Learning Python Content Source: AzureML-Docset/stable/docs-ref-autogen/azureml-core/azureml.core.Run(class).yml Service: machine-learning Sub-service: core GitHub Login: @DebFro Microsoft Alias: debfro

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tarockey>@tarockey</denchmark-link> Thanks for the question. We are investigating the issue and will update you shortly.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/DebFro>@DebFro</denchmark-link> can you please update 'path' to 'path_or_stream' in the upload_file remarks section. I don't have permissions to update this document. Thanks. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/51332022/85149159-f789fd00-b21e-11ea-8b52-cf9b4a76823f.png></denchmark-link>
Thanks for pointing that out. Fix made and will appear in next SDK release in a few days.
